title: Feet and footwear: caring for your feet
creator_credit: Ivan Gaal and TV Ed Productions
brief_description: Thomas is one-year old and is fitted for his first pair of shoes. It is an unhappy experience for him and raises questions regarding why we need footwear and why we need to care for our feet. Two podiatrists, a shoe manufacturer and a shoe retailer/fitter share their knowledge and advice relating to feet and footwear.
